title: Brazil : voting intention for 2018 presidential elections , by candidate
summary: This grouped bar chart represents SOME LABEL on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B.
All through the Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation B have climbed. On the other hand, for Situation A the SOME LABEL have lowered.
Out of all 2 groups, Situation A had the highest SOME LABEL in Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) and Situation A had the lowest SOME LABEL in Month Don't know.
Among all the Months, Situation B had the highest SOME LABEL in Month Blank or voided ballots/No vote and lowest SOME LABEL in Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT).
min_summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing SOME LABEL on the Y-axis throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B on the X-axis.
All through the Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation B have climbed. On the other hand, for Situation A the SOME LABEL have lowered.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents SOME LABEL on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B.
All through the Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation B have climbed. On the other hand, for Situation A the SOME LABEL have lowered.
Out of all 2 groups, Situation A had the highest SOME LABEL in Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) and Situation A had the lowest SOME LABEL in Month Don't know.
Among all the Months, Situation B had the highest SOME LABEL in Month Blank or voided ballots/No vote and lowest SOME LABEL in Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT).
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents SOME LABEL on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B.
All through the Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation B have climbed. On the other hand, for Situation A the SOME LABEL have lowered.
In Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT), Situation A had the highest SOME LABEL 39.0 among the 2 groups and in Don't know, Situation A had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
In Month Blank or voided ballots/No vote, Situation B had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) out of all 30 Months.
There is a gap of 22.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Situation B in Month Blank or voided ballots/No vote and Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT).
Among the groups, Situation A had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 39.0 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.
On average, the Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) had the highest SOME LABEL for all 2 groups Situation A, and Situation B. Whereas João Goulart Filho (PPL) had the lowest average SOME LABEL.

data.Month: Blank or voided ballots / No vote
